subject: AI & Agents
title: Code Generation: AI as Developer Assistant
description: A short lesson to help you apply Code Generation: AI as Developer Assistant.

hook.text: Copilot suggests 10 lines of code. You accept 7 and fix 3. Net productivity gain: massive.

buildup.text: Code generation models autocomplete, explain, refactor, and even write tests from descriptions.

discovery.text: Models trained on open-source code learn APIs, patterns, and idioms across hundreds of languages.

twist.text: Generated code can have bugs, security flaws, or license issues. Review is non-negotiable.

climax.text: Best use: boilerplate, repetitive tasks, and exploration. Worst use: blindly trusting complex logic.

punchline.text: AI writes the first draft. You own the final version.

quiz.question: Why must AI-generated code be reviewed?
options: It can contain bugs, security flaws, or license issues
